alert.note: Alert for Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 3:26AM MST until December 08 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley and Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest coverage and intensity of snow develops late this afternoon into the evening, when periods of moderate to heavy snow will be possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
